translation: They declare that sacrifice to be Tamasic which is contrary to the ordinances of the scriptures, in which no food is distributed, and which is devoid of mantras, gifts, and faith.
commentary: 17.13 without keeping to ordinance? Uncreated food in which no food is distributed? Mantrahinam which is devoid of Mantras? Adakshinam which is devoid of gifts? Shraddhavirhitam which is devoid of faith? Yajnam sacrifice? Tamasam Tamasic? parichakshate (they) declare.Commentary A sacrifice performed by a Tamasic man is never guided by any consideration for the prescribed rites or incantation. You
